TopicTitle: Undocking bug what do I do?

Articles.Content:

Anyone? I have a ship round Duna stuck with this wretched bug

Anyone? I have a ship round Duna stuck with this wretched bug

Are you playing on 0.90? I had this exact undocking bug when I was in 0.90 and I solved it by updating Kerbal joint Reinforcement to the latest version.

Nopw 1.02 and I am using the latest Kerbal joint .

This is game breaking as literally spend most my in game budget to get to duna.
Help my game progress is stuck This is game breaking guys.

ive got the same thing, also on linux with the latest version of KJR.

love that mod but im about to delete this save and start a new one and never touch it again

did this to me before

it even says in the changelog he fixed it..

im being a bit of a whiner right now
